Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Randwick Space in Kingsford, you'll be near the airport and minutes from University of New South Wales, and close to Prince of Wales Hospital and Community Health Service. This hotel is within close proximity of Royal Randwick Racecourse and Supa Centa Moore Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 80 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided once per stay, and cribs/infant beds (surcharge) can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 80 guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided once per stay, and cribs/infant beds (surcharge) can be requested.

With a stay at Randwick Space in Kingsford, you'll be near the airport and minutes from University of New South Wales, and close to Prince of Wales Hospital and Community Health Service. This hotel is within close proximity of Royal Randwick Racecourse and Supa Centa Moore Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

University of New South Wales - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Prince of Wales Hospital and Community Health Service - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Randwick Racecourse - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Supa Centa Moore Park - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Coogee Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Wiley's Baths - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Moore Park Golf Course - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Gordon's Bay - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Fox Studio Australia - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Sydney Cricket Ground - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Centennial Park - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Wedding Cake Island - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Clovelly Beach - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
George Hanna Memorial Museum - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Allianz Stadium - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi

The preferred airport for Randwick Space is Sydney, NSW (SYD-Kingsford Smith Intl.) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
